a.n: North Sea Jazz Archive: Wayne Shorter

p.k: North Sea Jazz Archive: Wayne Shorter Quartet 1986. Mitchel Forman, Wayne Shorter, Gary Willis & Tom Brechtlein. North Sea Jazz, The Hague, The Netherlands
p.d: The world-renowned North Sea Jazz Festival features a wide variety of genres, including traditional New Orleans jazz, swing, bop, free jazz, fusion, avant-garde and electronic jazz, blues, gospel, funk, soul, R&B, hip hop, world beat and Latin. The festival was founded by entrepreneur and jazz fan Paul Acket, who sold his highly successful pop magazine publishing house to organize and fund the first edition of the festival in 1976. This broadcast from the North Sea Jazz Archives presents the great Wayne Shorter Quartet. Shorter's maxim is to reinvent his music during each concert. He means to give his music a radical originality.
